publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3036 Brian Adam: A90 Dualling from Tipperty to Balmedie-That the Parliament notes the dangerously high levels of congestion on the A90 north of Aberdeen, the expected increase in traffic from the proposed new housing developments which will rely on this route and the poor accident record, and calls on the Scottish Executive to upgrade the single carriageway Tipperty to Balmedie stretch of the A90 to dual carriageway.

S1M-3036 Brian Adam: A90 Dualling from Tipperty to Balmedie-That the Parliament notes the dangerously high levels of congestion on the A90 north of Aberdeen, the expected increase in traffic from the proposed new housing developments which will rely on this route and the poor accident record, and calls on the Scottish Executive to upgrade the single carriageway Tipperty to Balmedie stretch of the A90 to dual carriageway. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-3036 A90 Dualling from Tipperty to Balmedie (lodged on 25 April 2002) Michael Matheson*
S1M-3036 A90 Dualling from Tipperty to Balmedie (lodged on 25 April 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-3036 A90 Dualling from Tipperty to Balmedie (lodged on 25 April 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3036 A90 Dualling from Tipperty to Balmedie (lodged on 25 April 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3036 A90 Dualling from Tipperty to Balmedie (lodged on 25 April 2002) Tricia Marwick*
